ingredients: +   1/2 cup sugar,   +   3/4 cup canola oil, 1 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 cup balsamic vinegar, 8 cups mixed salad greens, 2 cups sweetened dried cranberries,   +   1/2 pound fresh strawberries, quartered, 1  mango - peeled, seeded, and cubed,   +   1/2 cup chopped onion, 1 cup slivered almonds
nutrition: Total Fat 20g 26%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Sodium 205mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 22mg 112%, Calcium 58mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 281mg 6%
